item.description:
Hello - I thought it would be fun to do a bar crawl. (And full disclosure.... Oct 1 is my birthday, so I wanted to go out!) We're also celebrating Alex's 30th birthday, and Joe's one year anniversary in CT : )

Here's what I'm thinking:

7:30pm - Pacifico

8:45pmish - Prime 16

10pmish- Geronimo's

11pm+ - ????

Dinner had been originally suggested, but a few people pointed out to me the problems of trying to get space at BAR on a Friday, especially when I don't know who's coming for dinner, if we all have to be there to be seated, etc, so I am gratefully taking their advice and skipping an actual dinner (though I'm sure we'll snack along the way).

My number will be in my RSVP. I left the 11pm+ blank because I don't know if we'll be hyper and ready to dance, or wanting to wind down and go to a chill place. Give me a ring if you want to know where we are : )

Hope to see you there!! If anyone else has something they want to go out and celebrate, let me know and I'll post it : )
item.how_to_find_us: You should be able to find me because we'll be in the bar area, and I'll probably be wearing a blue-green patterned short sleeve shirt
item.name: **NHC does (Weekend!) New Haven Nightlife**
